content: materials - 1 2 skein s of purl soho s alpaca pure 1 100% alpaca yarn each skein is 109 yards/ 100 grams approximately 109 218 yards required we used alpaca pure in the color heirloom white for the baby hat and artemisia for the adult hat - us 5 3 75 mm 20-inch circular needle 3 - us 6 4 0 mm 20-inch circular needle - a set of us 6 double pointed needles 4 gauge 22 stitches = 3 inches in rib pattern unstretched using the smaller needles 30 stitches and 14 row = 3½ inches by 2⅛ inches in cable stitch pattern using the larger needles sizes baby adult to fit head circumference 14 16 20 23 inches notes when knitting the body of the hat i found it helpful to separate each repeat 30 stitches of the cable pattern with a stitch marker just be sure to use a different color marker for the end of the round alternatively you could knit the whole hat on double pointed needles and put each repeat on its own double pointed needle 1 https //www purlsoho com/alpaca-pure 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888
